channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.description: Incarcerated journalists detail the first signs of a heat wave in prison — and how they’ve coped with record-breaking temperatures.

item.description: Discover the many functions of vitamin D in your body, from preventing bone loss to warding off the flu, along with tips for raising your levels.

item.description: The South has the lowest fertility rate in the world, but the North's labor-intensive industries will be hit more acutely in the near term.
